video_prompt: A panoramic view from a spacecraft bridge: crew members subtly shift and interact with glowing consoles. Outside, a central purple energy source pulses, emitting crackling lightning that expands. Spaceships maneuver, fire energy bursts and missiles, explode in flashes of light, and shatter within defensive bubbles. Distant cosmic elements subtly drift.
image_prompt: Intense space battle viewed from inside a futuristic spacecraft bridge. A central four-pointed star-shaped object glows with purple energy, emitting lightning. Diverse spaceships engage in combat, firing energy bursts, with some exploding. Large capital ships, some within blue defensive bubbles, and monolithic cube structures are present. Figures in military space suits are visible from behind on the bridge, interacting with holographic displays and control panels, while subtle blue lights illuminate the sleek interior. High-stakes science fiction warfare.
refined_video_prompt: Crew members subtly shift, interacting with consoles. Outside, a purple energy source pulses, emitting crackling lightning that expands. Spaceships maneuver, firing energy bursts and missiles, then exploding in flashes of light and shattering within defensive bubbles. Distant cosmic elements subtly drift.
